content:
FILE_WRITTEN:src/intake/validation_checklist.py
DIR_STATE:["src/intake/validation_checklist.py"]
SUMMARY: Added a blocking intake checklist with DOI-missing defaults (2019–2025) and required query keywords/author fields, rejecting tasks lacking verbatim claim, source context, or provenance anchor.
